Tuesday, May 28, 2024

The Rails World 2024 speaker list is live

Posted by The Rails Foundation

The second edition of Rails World is fast approaching, so we are excited to share with you the list of speakers joining us in Toronto this year.

These speakers will deep dive into new tools such as Solid Queue and Kamal Proxy, and share insights on enhancing and understanding Rails, deploying with Kamal, optimizing database performance, automating Rails upgrades, improving accessibility and security, and much more.

And now: Meet the 2024 speakers (in alphabetical order):

Keynotes & Rails Core:

  • Aaron Patterson
  • David Heinemeier Hansson
  • Eileen M. Uchitelle
  • Rafael França
  • Tobias Lütke
  • Xavier Noria

Sessions:

  • Andrea Fomera
  • Bruno Prieto
  • David Henner
  • Donal McBreen
  • Emmanuel Hayford
  • Greg Molnar
  • Jamis Buck
  • Jenny Shen
  • Julia López
  • Justin Searls
  • Kevin McConnell
  • Miles McGuire
  • Obie Fernandez
  • Ridhwana Khan
  • Rosa Gutierrez
  • Robby Russell
  • Stephen Margheim

Stay tuned for the full Rails World schedule coming later in August.

Second ticket release
